trans-unit.source: If flags contains the VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT flag, and basePipelineIndex is -1, basePipelineHandlemust be a valid handle to a compute VkPipeline
trans-unit.target: Si los flags contienen el indicador VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT y basePipelineIndex es -1, basePipelineHandle debe ser un identificador válido para un cálculo VkPipeline

trans-unit.source: If flags contains the VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT flag, and basePipelineIndex is -1, basePipelineHandlemust be a valid handle to a graphics VkPipeline
trans-unit.target: Si los flags contienen el indicador VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT y basePipelineIndex es -1, basePipelineHandle debe ser un identificador válido para un VkPipeline de gráficos

trans-unit.source: If flags contains the VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT flag, and basePipelineIndex is not -1, basePipelineHandlemust be VK_NULL_HANDLE
trans-unit.target: Si los flags contienen el indicador VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT y basePipelineIndex no es -1, basePipelineHandle debe ser VK_NULL_HANDLE

trans-unit.source: If flags does not contain VK_SPARSE_MEMORY_BIND_METADATA_BIT, the binding range must be within the range [0,VkMemoryRequirements::size).
trans-unit.target: Si las flags no contienen VK_SPARSE_MEMORY_BIND_METADATA_BIT , el rango de enlace debe estar dentro del rango [0, VkMemoryRequirements :: size ).

trans-unit.source: If flags includes VK_ATTACHMENT_DESCRIPTION_MAY_ALIAS_BIT, then the attachment is treated as if it shares physical memory with another attachment in the same render pass. This information limits the ability of the implementation to reorder certain operations (like layout transitions and the loadOp) such that it is not improperly reordered against other uses of the same physical memory via a different attachment. This is described in more detail below.
trans-unit.target: Si las flags incluyen VK_ATTACHMENT_DESCRIPTION_MAY_ALIAS_BIT , entonces el adjunto se trata como si compartiera memoria física con otro adjunto en la misma pasada de renderizado. Esta información limita la capacidad de la implementación para reordenar ciertas operaciones (como las transiciones de diseño y loadOp ) de modo que no se reordene incorrectamente para otros usos de la misma memoria física a través de un adjunto diferente. Esto se describe en más detalle a continuación.

trans-unit.source: If format is a block-compression format, then buffers must not support any features for the format.
trans-unit.target: Si el format o es un formato de compresión de bloques, los búferes no deben admitir ninguna función para el formato.

trans-unit.source: If format is not a supported image format, or if the combination of format, type, tiling, usage, and flags is not supported for images, then vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties returns VK_ERROR_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED.
trans-unit.target: Si format no es un formato de imagen compatible, o si la combinación de format o , type , tiling , usage y flags no es compatible con imágenes, entonces vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties devuelve VK_ERROR_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED .

trans-unit.source: If framebuffer is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si framebuffer es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If framebuffer is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, framebuffermust be a valid VkFramebuffer handle
trans-unit.target: Si framebuffer no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , framebuffer debe ser un identificador VkFramebuffer válido

trans-unit.source: If image has a depth/stencil format with both depth and stencil components, then aspectMask member of subresourceRangemust include both VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT and VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si image tiene un formato de profundidad / stencil tanto con la profundidad y los componentes de la plantilla, a continuación, aspectMask miembro de subresourceRange debe incluir tanto VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT y VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT

trans-unit.source: If image is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si la image n es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If image is non-sparse then it must be bound completely and contiguously to a single VkDeviceMemory object
trans-unit.target: Si la image n no es dispersa, entonces debe estar vinculada completa y contiguamente a un solo objeto VkDeviceMemory

trans-unit.source: If image is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, imagemust be a valid VkImage handle
trans-unit.target: Si la image n no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , la image ndebe ser un identificador VkImage válido

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT, formatmust be supported for color attachments, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT , format debe ser compatible con los accesorios de color, según lo especificado por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT, formatmust be supported for depth/stencil attachments, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT , format debe ser compatible con los archivos adjuntos de profundidad / de la plantilla, según lo especificado por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT, formatmust be supported for sampled images, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT , format debe ser compatible con las imágenes de la muestra, tal como se especifica por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT, formatmust be supported for storage images, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT , format debe ser compatible con imágenes de almacenamiento, tal como se especifica por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR, formatmust be format that has at least one supported feature bit present in the value of VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si la image n se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR , el format odebe ser un formato que tenga al menos un bit de característica compatible presente en el valor de VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT, formatmust be supported for color attachments, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT , format debe ser compatible con los accesorios de color, según lo especificado por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT, formatmust be supported for depth/stencil attachments, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT , format debe ser compatible con los archivos adjuntos de profundidad / de la plantilla, según lo especificado por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT, formatmust be supported for sampled images, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT , format debe ser compatible con las imágenes de la muestra, tal como se especifica por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL and usage contains VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT, formatmust be supported for storage images, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si image se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y usage contiene VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT , format debe ser compatible con imágenes de almacenamiento, tal como se especifica por el VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT bandera en VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures devueltos por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, formatmust be format that has at least one supported feature bit present in the value of VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si la image n se creó con VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL , el format odebe ser un formato que tenga al menos un bit de característica admitido presente en el valor de VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If image was created with a sharing mode of VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT, srcQueueFamilyIndex and dstQueueFamilyIndexmust both be VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED
trans-unit.target: Si la image n se creó con un modo para compartir de VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT , srcQueueFamilyIndex y dstQueueFamilyIndex deben ser ambos VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED

trans-unit.source: If image was created with a sharing mode of VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, srcQueueFamilyIndex and dstQueueFamilyIndexmust either both be VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED, or both be a valid queue family (see html/vkspec.html#devsandqueues-queueprops).
trans-unit.target: Si la image n se creó con un modo de VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE compartido de VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE , srcQueueFamilyIndex y dstQueueFamilyIndex deben ser ambos VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED o ambos ser una familia de colas válida (consulte html / vkspec.html # devsandqueues-queueprops ).

trans-unit.source: If image was created with a sharing mode of VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, and srcQueueFamilyIndex and dstQueueFamilyIndex are not VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED, at least one of them must be the same as the family of the queue that will execute this barrier
trans-unit.target: Si la image n se creó con un modo de VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE compartido de VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE , y srcQueueFamilyIndex y dstQueueFamilyIndex no son VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED , al menos uno de ellos debe ser el mismo que la familia de la cola que ejecutará esta barrera

trans-unit.source: If image was created with the VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT flag, formatcan be different from the image’s format, but if they are not equal they must be compatible. Image format compatibility is defined in the Format Compatibility Classes section. Views of compatible formats will have the same mapping between texel coordinates and memory locations irrespective of the format, with only the interpretation of the bit pattern changing.
trans-unit.target: Si la image n se creó con la VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT , el format opuede ser diferente al formato de la imagen, pero si no son iguales, deben ser compatibles . La compatibilidad del formato de imagen se define en la sección Clases de compatibilidad de formato . Las vistas de formatos compatibles tendrán el mismo mapeo entre coordenadas de texel y ubicaciones de memoria independientemente del format o , y solo cambiará la interpretación del patrón de bits.

trans-unit.source: If image was created with the VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT flag, formatmust be compatible with the format used to create image, as defined in Format Compatibility Classes
trans-unit.target: Si la image n se creó con la VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT , el format odebe ser compatible con el format o utilizado para crear la image n , como se define en Clases de compatibilidad de formatos.

trans-unit.source: If image was not created with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT then viewTypemust not be VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE or VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE_ARRAY
trans-unit.target: Si la image n no se creó con VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT , viewType no debe ser VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE o VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE_ARRAY

trans-unit.source: If image was not created with the VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT flag, formatmust be identical to the format used to create image
trans-unit.target: Si la image n no se creó con la VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT , el format odebe ser idéntico al format o utilizado para crear la image n

trans-unit.source: If imageBindCount is not 0, pImageBindsmust be a pointer to an array of imageBindCount valid VkSparseImageMemoryBindInfo structures
trans-unit.target: Si imageBindCount no es 0 , pImageBinds debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras imageBindCount válidas de VkSparseImageMemoryBindInfo

trans-unit.source: If imageMemoryBarrierCount is not 0, pImageMemoryBarriersmust be a pointer to an array of imageMemoryBarrierCount valid VkImageMemoryBarrier structures
trans-unit.target: Si imageMemoryBarrierCount no es 0 , pImageMemoryBarriers debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras imageMemoryBarrierCount válidas de VkImageMemoryBarrier

trans-unit.source: If imageOpaqueBindCount is not 0, pImageOpaqueBindsmust be a pointer to an array of imageOpaqueBindCount valid VkSparseImageOpaqueMemoryBindInfo structures
trans-unit.target: Si imageOpaqueBindCount no es 0 , pImageOpaqueBinds debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras imageOpaqueBindCount válidas de VkSparseImageOpaqueMemoryBindInfo

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D, extent.widthmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxImageDimension1D, or VkImageFormatProperties::maxExtent.width (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties with format, imageType, tiling, usage, and flags equal to those in this structure) - whichever is higher
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D , extent.width debe ser menor o igual a VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxImageDimension1D o VkImageFormatProperties :: maxExtent.width (devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties con format o , imageType , tiling , usage y flags iguales a los de esta estructura) - el que sea más alto

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D, flagsmust not contain VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D , las flags no deben contener VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D, both extent.height and extent.depthmust be 1
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D , tanto extent.height como extent.depth deben ser 1

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and flags contains VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT, extent.width and extent.heightmust be equal and arrayLayersmust be greater than or equal to 6
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D y las flags contienen VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT , extent.width y extent.height deben ser iguales y arrayLayers deben ser mayores o iguales a 6

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and flags contains VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT, extent.width and extent.heightmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxImageDimensionCube, or VkImageFormatProperties::maxExtent.width/height (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties with format, imageType, tiling, usage, and flags equal to those in this structure) - whichever is higher
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D y flags contiene VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT , extent.width y extent.height debe ser menor o igual a VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxImageDimensionCube o VkImageFormatProperties :: maxExtent.width / altura (devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties con format o , imageType , tiling , usage , y flags iguales a las de esta estructura) - la que sea más alta

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and flags does not contain VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT, extent.width and extent.heightmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxImageDimension2D, or VkImageFormatProperties::maxExtent.width/height (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties with format, imageType, tiling, usage, and flags equal to those in this structure) - whichever is higher
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D y flags no contiene VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT , extent.width y extent.height debe ser menor o igual a VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxImageDimension2D o VkImageFormatProperties :: maxExtent.width / altura (devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties con format o , imageType , tiling , usage y flags iguales a los de esta estructura) - el que sea mayor

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D, extent.depthmust be 1
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D , la extent.depth debe ser 1

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3D, arrayLayersmust be 1.
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3D , arrayLayers debe ser 1 .

trans-unit.source: If imageType is VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3D, extent.width, extent.height and extent.depthmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxImageDimension3D, or VkImageFormatProperties::maxExtent.width/height/depth (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties with format, imageType, tiling, usage, and flags equal to those in this structure) - whichever is higher
trans-unit.target: Si imageType es VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3D , extent.width , extent.height y extent.depth debe ser menor que o igual a VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxImageDimension3D , o VkImageFormatProperties :: maxExtent.width / altura / profundidad (como devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties con format o , imageType , tiling , usage y flags iguales a los de esta estructura) - el que sea mayor

trans-unit.source: If imageView is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si imageView es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If imageView is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, imageViewmust be a valid VkImageView handle
trans-unit.target: Si imageView no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , imageView debe ser un identificador VkImageView válido

trans-unit.source: If initialDataSize is not 0, pInitialDatamust be a pointer to an array of initialDataSize bytes
trans-unit.target: Si initialDataSize no es 0 , pInitialData debe ser un puntero a una matriz de bytes initialDataSize

trans-unit.source: If initialDataSize is not 0, pInitialDatamust have been retrieved from a previous call to vkGetPipelineCacheData
trans-unit.target: Si initialDataSize no es 0 , pInitialData debe haberse recuperado de una llamada anterior a vkGetPipelineCacheData

trans-unit.source: If initialDataSize is not 0, it must be equal to the size of pInitialData, as returned by vkGetPipelineCacheData when pInitialData was originally retrieved
trans-unit.target: Si initialDataSize no es 0 , debe ser igual al tamaño de pInitialData , como lo devolvió vkGetPipelineCacheData cuando pInitialData se recuperó originalmente

trans-unit.source: If inputAttachmentCount is not 0, pInputAttachmentsmust be a pointer to an array of inputAttachmentCount valid VkAttachmentReference structures
trans-unit.target: Si inputAttachmentCount no es 0 , pInputAttachments debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras inputAttachmentCount válidas de VkAttachmentReference

trans-unit.source: If instance is not NULL, instancemust be a valid VkInstance handle
trans-unit.target: Si la instance no es NULL , la instance debe ser un identificador de VkInstance válido

trans-unit.source: If logicOpEnable is VK_TRUE, logicOpmust be a valid VkLogicOp value
trans-unit.target: Si logicOpEnable es VK_TRUE , logicOp debe ser un valor VkLogicOp válido

trans-unit.source: If mapEntryCount is not 0, pMapEntriesmust be a pointer to an array of mapEntryCount valid VkSpecializationMapEntry structures
trans-unit.target: Si mapEntryCount no es 0 , pMapEntries debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras mapEntryCount válidas VkSpecializationMapEntry

trans-unit.source: If memory is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si la memory es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If memory is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, memory and memoryOffsetmust match the memory requirements of the resource, as described in section html/vkspec.html#resources-association
trans-unit.target: Si la memory no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , memory y memoryOffset deben coincidir con los requisitos de memoria del recurso, como se describe en la sección html / vkspec.html # resources-association

trans-unit.source: If memory is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, memorymust be a valid VkDeviceMemory handle
trans-unit.target: Si la memory no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , la memory debe ser un identificador VkDeviceMemory válido

trans-unit.source: If memory is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, memorymust not have been created with a memory type that reports VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT bit set
trans-unit.target: Si la memory no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , la memory no debe haber sido creada con un tipo de memoria que informe VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT bit establecido

trans-unit.source: If memoryBarrierCount is not 0, pMemoryBarriersmust be a pointer to an array of memoryBarrierCount valid VkMemoryBarrier structures
trans-unit.target: Si memoryBarrierCount no es 0 , pMemoryBarriers debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras memoryBarrierCount válidas de VkMemoryBarrier

trans-unit.source: If oldLayout is not equal to newLayout, then the memory barrier defines an image layout transition for the specified image subresource range.
trans-unit.target: Si oldLayout no es igual a newLayout , entonces la barrera de memoria define una transición de diseño de imagen para el rango de recursos secundarios de imagen especificado.

trans-unit.source: If pAllocator is not NULL, pAllocatormust be a pointer to a valid VkAllocationCallbacks structure
trans-unit.target: Si pAllocator no es NULL , pAllocator debe ser un puntero a una estructura VkAllocationCallbacks válida

trans-unit.source: If pApplicationInfo is not NULL, pApplicationInfomust be a pointer to a valid VkApplicationInfo structure
trans-unit.target: Si pApplicationInfo no es NULL , pApplicationInfo debe ser un puntero a una estructura VkApplicationInfo válida

trans-unit.source: If pApplicationName is not NULL, pApplicationNamemust be a null-terminated UTF-8 string
trans-unit.target: Si pApplicationName no es NULL , pApplicationName debe ser una cadena UTF-8 terminada en nulo

trans-unit.source: If pCode declares any of the capabilities that are listed as not required by the implementation, the relevant feature must be enabled, as listed in the SPIR-V Environment appendix
trans-unit.target: Si pCode declara alguna de las capacidades que se enumeran como no requeridas por la implementación, la característica relevante debe estar habilitada, como se enumera en el apéndice del entorno SPIR-V

trans-unit.source: If pData is NULL, then the maximum size of the data that can be retrieved from the pipeline cache, in bytes, is returned in pDataSize. Otherwise, pDataSizemust point to a variable set by the user to the size of the buffer, in bytes, pointed to by pData, and on return the variable is overwritten with the amount of data actually written to pData.
trans-unit.target: Si pData es NULL , el tamaño máximo de los datos que se pueden recuperar de la caché de la canalización, en bytes, se devuelve en pDataSize . De lo contrario, pDataSize debe apuntar a una variable establecida por el usuario al tamaño del búfer, en bytes, apuntada por pData , y al regresar la variable se sobrescribe con la cantidad de datos realmente escritos en pData .

trans-unit.source: If pDataSize is less than the maximum size that can be retrieved by the pipeline cache, at most pDataSize bytes will be written to pData, and vkGetPipelineCacheData will return VK_INCOMPLETE. Any data written to pData is valid and can be provided as the pInitialData member of the VkPipelineCacheCreateInfo structure passed to vkCreatePipelineCache.
trans-unit.target: Si pDataSize es menor que el tamaño máximo que puede ser recuperado por la caché de la canalización, como máximo pDataSize bytes se escribirán en pData y vkGetPipelineCacheData devolverá VK_INCOMPLETE . Cualquier dato escrito en pData es válido y se puede proporcionar como el miembro pInitialData de la estructura VkPipelineCacheCreateInfo pasada a vkCreatePipelineCache .

trans-unit.source: If pDataSize is less than what is necessary to store this header, nothing will be written to pData and zero will be written to pDataSize.
trans-unit.target: Si pDataSize es menor que lo necesario para almacenar este encabezado, no se escribirá nada en pData y se escribirá cero en pDataSize .

trans-unit.source: If pDepthStencilAttachment is not NULL, pDepthStencilAttachmentmust be a pointer to a valid VkAttachmentReference structure
trans-unit.target: Si pDepthStencilAttachment no es NULL , pDepthStencilAttachment debe ser un puntero a una estructura VkAttachmentReference válida

trans-unit.source: If pDepthStencilAttachment is not VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED and any attachments in pColorAttachments are not VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED, they must have the same sample count
trans-unit.target: Si pDepthStencilAttachment no es VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED y los adjuntos en pColorAttachments no son VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED , deben tener el mismo recuento de muestras

trans-unit.source: If pDynamicState is not NULL, pDynamicStatemust be a pointer to a valid VkPipelineDynamicStateCreateInfo structure
trans-unit.target: Si pDynamicState no es NULL , pDynamicState debe ser un puntero a una estructura VkPipelineDynamicStateCreateInfo válida

trans-unit.source: If pEnabledFeatures is not NULL, pEnabledFeaturesmust be a pointer to a valid VkPhysicalDeviceFeatures structure
trans-unit.target: Si pEnabledFeatures no es NULL , pEnabledFeatures debe ser un puntero a una estructura VkPhysicalDeviceFeatures válida

trans-unit.source: If pEngineName is not NULL, pEngineNamemust be a null-terminated UTF-8 string
trans-unit.target: Si pEngineName no es NULL , pEngineName debe ser una cadena UTF-8 terminada en nulo

trans-unit.source: If pEvents includes one or more events that will be signaled by vkSetEvent after commandBuffer has been submitted to a queue, then vkCmdWaitEventsmust not be called inside a render pass instance
trans-unit.target: Si pEvents incluye uno o más eventos que serán señalizadas por vkSetEvent después commandBuffer ha sido enviado a una cola, a continuación, vkCmdWaitEvents deben no ser llamados dentro de un render ejemplo pase

trans-unit.source: If pLayerName is not NULL, pLayerNamemust be a null-terminated UTF-8 string
trans-unit.target: Si pLayerName no es NULL , pLayerName debe ser una cadena UTF-8 terminada en nulo

trans-unit.source: If pOriginal is NULL, then pfnReallocationmust behave equivalently to a call to PFN_vkAllocationFunction with the same parameter values (without pOriginal).
trans-unit.target: Si pOriginal es NULL , pfnReallocation debe comportarse de manera equivalente a una llamada a PFN_vkAllocationFunction con los mismos valores de parámetro (sin pOriginal ).

trans-unit.source: If pOriginal is non-NULL, the implementation must ensure that alignment is equal to the alignment used to originally allocate pOriginal.
trans-unit.target: Si pOriginal no es NULL , la implementación debe garantizar que la alignment sea igual a la alignment utilizada para asignar originalmente pOriginal .

trans-unit.source: If pPhysicalDevices is NULL, then the number of physical devices available is returned in pPhysicalDeviceCount. Otherwise, pPhysicalDeviceCountmust point to a variable set by the user to the number of elements in the pPhysicalDevices array, and on return the variable is overwritten with the number of handles actually written to pPhysicalDevices. If pPhysicalDeviceCount is less than the number of physical devices available, at most pPhysicalDeviceCount structures will be written. If pPhysicalDeviceCount is smaller than the number of physical devices available, VK_INCOMPLETE will be returned instead of VK_SUCCESS, to indicate that not all the available physical devices were returned.
trans-unit.target: Si pPhysicalDevices es NULL , la cantidad de dispositivos físicos disponibles se devuelve en pPhysicalDeviceCount . De lo contrario, pPhysicalDeviceCount debe apuntar a una variable establecida por el usuario al número de elementos en la matriz pPhysicalDevices , y al regresar la variable se sobrescribe con el número de identificadores realmente escritos en pPhysicalDevices . Si pPhysicalDeviceCount es menor que la cantidad de dispositivos físicos disponibles, se escribirán como pPhysicalDeviceCount estructuras pPhysicalDeviceCount . Si pPhysicalDeviceCount es menor que la cantidad de dispositivos físicos disponibles, VK_INCOMPLETE se devolverá en lugar de VK_SUCCESS , para indicar que no se devolvieron todos los dispositivos físicos disponibles.

trans-unit.source: If pProperties is NULL, then the number of extensions properties available is returned in pPropertyCount. Otherwise, pPropertyCountmust point to a variable set by the user to the number of elements in the pProperties array, and on return the variable is overwritten with the number of structures actually written to pProperties. If pPropertyCount is less than the number of extension properties available, at most pPropertyCount structures will be written. If pPropertyCount is smaller than the number of extensions available, VK_INCOMPLETE will be returned instead of VK_SUCCESS, to indicate that not all the available properties were returned.
trans-unit.target: Si pProperties es NULL , el número de propiedades de extensiones disponibles se devuelve en pPropertyCount . De lo contrario, pPropertyCount debe apuntar a una variable establecida por el usuario al número de elementos en la matriz pProperties , y al devolver la variable se sobrescribe con el número de estructuras realmente escritas en pProperties . Si pPropertyCount es menor que el número de propiedades de extensión disponibles, se escribirán como pPropertyCount estructuras pPropertyCount . Si pPropertyCount es menor que el número de extensiones disponibles, se VK_INCOMPLETE lugar de VK_SUCCESS , para indicar que no se devolvieron todas las propiedades disponibles.

trans-unit.source: If pProperties is NULL, then the number of layer properties available is returned in pPropertyCount. Otherwise, pPropertyCountmust point to a variable set by the user to the number of elements in the pProperties array, and on return the variable is overwritten with the number of structures actually written to pProperties. If pPropertyCount is less than the number of layer properties available, at most pPropertyCount structures will be written. If pPropertyCount is smaller than the number of layers available, VK_INCOMPLETE will be returned instead of VK_SUCCESS, to indicate that not all the available layer properties were returned.
trans-unit.target: Si pProperties es NULL , el número de propiedades de capa disponibles se devuelve en pPropertyCount . De lo contrario, pPropertyCount debe apuntar a una variable establecida por el usuario al número de elementos en la matriz pProperties , y al devolver la variable se sobrescribe con el número de estructuras realmente escritas en pProperties . Si pPropertyCount es menor que el número de propiedades de capa disponibles, se escribirán como pPropertyCount estructuras de pPropertyCount . Si pPropertyCount es menor que el número de capas disponibles, se VK_INCOMPLETE lugar de VK_SUCCESS , para indicar que no se devolvieron todas las propiedades de capa disponibles.

trans-unit.source: If pProperties is NULL, then the number of sparse format properties available is returned in pPropertyCount. Otherwise, pPropertyCountmust point to a variable set by the user to the number of elements in the pProperties array, and on return the variable is overwritten with the number of structures actually written to pProperties. If pPropertyCount is less than the number of sparse format properties available, at most pPropertyCount structures will be written.
trans-unit.target: Si pProperties es NULL , el número de propiedades de formato disperso disponibles se devuelve en pPropertyCount . De lo contrario, pPropertyCount debe apuntar a una variable establecida por el usuario al número de elementos en la matriz pProperties , y al devolver la variable se sobrescribe con el número de estructuras realmente escritas en pProperties . Si pPropertyCount es menor que el número de propiedades de formato dispersas disponibles, se escribirán como pPropertyCount estructuras pPropertyCount .

trans-unit.source: If pQueueFamilyProperties is NULL, then the number of queue families available is returned in pQueueFamilyPropertyCount. Otherwise, pQueueFamilyPropertyCountmust point to a variable set by the user to the number of elements in the pQueueFamilyProperties array, and on return the variable is overwritten with the number of structures actually written to pQueueFamilyProperties. If pQueueFamilyPropertyCount is less than the number of queue families available, at most pQueueFamilyPropertyCount structures will be written.
trans-unit.target: Si pQueueFamilyProperties es NULL , el número de familias de colas disponibles se devuelve en pQueueFamilyPropertyCount . De lo contrario, pQueueFamilyPropertyCount debe apuntar a una variable establecida por el usuario para el número de elementos en la matriz pQueueFamilyProperties y, al regresar, la variable se sobrescribe con el número de estructuras realmente escritas en pQueueFamilyProperties . Si pQueueFamilyPropertyCount es menor que el número de familias de colas disponibles, se escribirán como pQueueFamilyPropertyCount estructuras pQueueFamilyPropertyCount .

trans-unit.source: If pResolveAttachments is not NULL, for each resolve attachment that does not have the value VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED, the corresponding color attachment must not have the value VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED
trans-unit.target: Si pResolveAttachments no es NULL , para cada adjunto de resolución que no tenga el valor VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED , el adjunto de color correspondiente no debe tener el valor VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED

trans-unit.source: If pResolveAttachments is not NULL, the sample count of each element of pColorAttachmentsmust be anything other than VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si pResolveAttachments no es NULL , el recuento de muestras de cada elemento de pColorAttachments debe ser distinto de VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT

trans-unit.source: If pSampleMask is not NULL, pSampleMaskmust be a pointer to an array of \(\lceil{\mathit{rasterizationSamples} \over 32}\rceil\) VkSampleMask values
trans-unit.target: Si pSampleMask no es NULL , pSampleMask debe ser un puntero a una matriz de valores de \ (\ lceil {\ mathit {rasterizationSamples} \ over 32} \ rceil \) VkSampleMask

trans-unit.source: If pSparseMemoryRequirements is NULL, then the number of sparse memory requirements available is returned in pSparseMemoryRequirementCount. Otherwise, pSparseMemoryRequirementCountmust point to a variable set by the user to the number of elements in the pSparseMemoryRequirements array, and on return the variable is overwritten with the number of structures actually written to pSparseMemoryRequirements. If pSparseMemoryRequirementCount is less than the number of sparse memory requirements available, at most pSparseMemoryRequirementCount structures will be written.
trans-unit.target: Si pSparseMemoryRequirements es NULL , el número de requisitos de memoria dispersa disponibles se devuelve en pSparseMemoryRequirementCount . De lo contrario, pSparseMemoryRequirementCount debe apuntar a una variable establecida por el usuario en el número de elementos de la matriz pSparseMemoryRequirements y, al regresar, la variable se sobrescribe con el número de estructuras realmente escritas en pSparseMemoryRequirements . Si pSparseMemoryRequirementCount es menor que el número de requisitos de memoria dispersa disponibles, se escribirán como pSparseMemoryRequirementCount estructuras pSparseMemoryRequirementCount .

trans-unit.source: If pSpecializationInfo is not NULL, pSpecializationInfomust be a pointer to a valid VkSpecializationInfo structure
trans-unit.target: Si pSpecializationInfo no es NULL , pSpecializationInfo debe ser un puntero a una estructura VkSpecializationInfo válida

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes a fragment shader stage and a geometry shader stage, and the fragment shader code reads from an input variable that is decorated with PrimitiveID, then the geometry shader code must write to a matching output variable, decorated with PrimitiveID, in all execution paths
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye una etapa de sombreado de fragmentos y una etapa de sombreado de geometría, y el código de sombreado de fragmentos se lee desde una variable de entrada decorada con PrimitiveID , entonces el código de sombreado de geometría debe escribir en una variable de salida coincidente, decorada con PrimitiveID , en todas las rutas de ejecución

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes a fragment shader stage, its shader code must not read from any input attachment that is defined as VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED in subpass
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye una etapa de sombreado de fragmentos, su código de sombreado no debe leerse de ningún adjunto de entrada definido como VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED en subpass

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes a geometry shader stage, and also includes tessellation shader stages, its shader code must contain an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies an input primitive type that is compatible with the primitive topology that is output by the tessellation stages
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye una etapa de sombreado de geometría y también incluye etapas de sombreado de teselación, su código de sombreado debe contener una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifique un tipo primitivo de entrada que sea compatible con la topología primitiva que generan las etapas de teselación

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes a geometry shader stage, and does not include any tessellation shader stages, its shader code must contain an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies an input primitive type that is compatible with the primitive topology specified in pInputAssembly
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye una etapa de sombreado de geometría y no incluye ninguna etapa de sombreado de teselación, su código de sombreado debe contener una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifique un tipo primitivo de entrada que sea compatible con la topología primitiva especificada en pInputAssembly

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes a tessellation control shader stage and a tessellation evaluation shader stage, pTessellationStatemust be a pointer to a valid VkPipelineTessellationStateCreateInfo structure
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye una etapa de sombreado de control de teselación y una etapa de sombreado de evaluación de teselación, pTessellationState debe ser un puntero a una estructura VkPipelineTessellationStateCreateInfo válida

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes a tessellation control shader stage, it must include a tessellation evaluation shader stage
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye una etapa de sombreado de control de teselación, debe incluir una etapa de sombreado de evaluación de teselación

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes a tessellation evaluation shader stage, it must include a tessellation control shader stage
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye una etapa de sombreado de evaluación de teselación, debe incluir una etapa de sombreado de control de teselación

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes tessellation shader stages, and the shader code of both contain an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies the out patch size in the pipeline, they must both specify the same patch size
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye etapas de sombreado de teselación y el código de sombreado de ambos contiene una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifica el tamaño de parche de salida en la canalización, ambos deben especificar el mismo tamaño de parche

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes tessellation shader stages, and the shader code of both stages contain an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies the type of subdivision in the pipeline, they must both specify the same subdivision mode
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye etapas de sombreado de teselación y el código de sombreado de ambas etapas contiene una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifica el tipo de subdivisión en la canalización, ambos deben especificar el mismo modo de subdivisión

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes tessellation shader stages, the topology member of pInputAssemblymust be VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_PATCH_LIST
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye etapas de sombreado de teselación, el miembro de topology de pInputAssembly debe ser VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_PATCH_LIST

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes tessellation shader stages, the shader code of at least one stage must contain an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies the output patch size in the pipeline
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye etapas de sombreado de teselación, el código de sombreado de al menos una etapa debe contener una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifique el tamaño del parche de salida en la canalización

trans-unit.source: If pStages includes tessellation shader stages, the shader code of at least one stage must contain an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies the type of subdivision in the pipeline
trans-unit.target: Si pStages incluye etapas de sombreado de teselación, el código de sombreado de al menos una etapa debe contener una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifique el tipo de subdivisión en la canalización

trans-unit.source: If pfnAllocation is unable to allocate the requested memory, it must return NULL. If the allocation was successful, it must return a valid pointer to memory allocation containing at least size bytes, and with the pointer value being a multiple of alignment.
trans-unit.target: Si pfnAllocation no puede asignar la memoria solicitada, debe devolver NULL . Si la asignación fue exitosa, debe devolver un puntero válido a la asignación de memoria que contenga al menos bytes de size y que el valor del puntero sea un múltiplo de alignment .

trans-unit.source: If pfnAllocation returns NULL, and if the implementation is unable to continue correct processing of the current command without the requested allocation, it must treat this as a run-time error, and generate VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_HOST_MEMORY at the appropriate time for the command in which the condition was detected, as described in Return Codes.
trans-unit.target: Si pfnAllocation devuelve NULL , y si la implementación no puede continuar con el procesamiento correcto del comando actual sin la asignación solicitada, debe tratar esto como un error en tiempo de ejecución y generar VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_HOST_MEMORY en el momento apropiado para el comando en el que se produjo la condición. detectado, como se describe en Códigos de retorno .

trans-unit.source: If pipeline is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si la pipeline es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If pipeline is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, pipelinemust be a valid VkPipeline handle
trans-unit.target: Si la pipeline no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , la pipeline debe ser un identificador VkPipeline válido

trans-unit.source: If pipelineBindPoint is VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_COMPUTE, pipelinemust be a compute pipeline
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineBindPoint es VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_COMPUTE , la pipeline debe ser una canalización de cómputo

trans-unit.source: If pipelineBindPoint is VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_COMPUTE, the VkCommandPool that commandBuffer was allocated from must support compute operations
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineBindPoint es VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_COMPUTE , el VkCommandPool desde el que se asignó commandBuffer debe admitir operaciones de cálculo

trans-unit.source: If pipelineBindPoint is VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS, pipelinemust be a graphics pipeline
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineBindPoint es VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS , la pipeline debe ser una canalización de gráficos

trans-unit.source: If pipelineBindPoint is VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS, the VkCommandPool that commandBuffer was allocated from must support graphics operations
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineBindPoint es VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS , el VkCommandPool desde el que se asignó commandBuffer debe admitir operaciones gráficas

trans-unit.source: If pipelineCache is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineCache es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If pipelineCache is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, pipelineCachemust be a valid VkPipelineCache handle
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineCache no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , pipelineCache debe ser un identificador VkPipelineCache válido

trans-unit.source: If pipelineLayout is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineLayout es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If pipelineLayout is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, pipelineLayoutmust be a valid VkPipelineLayout handle
trans-unit.target: Si pipelineLayout no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , pipelineLayout debe ser un identificador VkPipelineLayout válido

trans-unit.source: If preserveAttachmentCount is not 0, pPreserveAttachmentsmust be a pointer to an array of preserveAttachmentCountuint32_t values
trans-unit.target: Si preserveAttachmentCount no es 0 , pPreserveAttachments debe ser un puntero a una matriz de valores de preserveAttachmentCount uint32_t

trans-unit.source: If pushConstantRangeCount is not 0, pPushConstantRangesmust be a pointer to an array of pushConstantRangeCount valid VkPushConstantRange structures
trans-unit.target: Si pushConstantRangeCount no es 0 , pPushConstantRanges debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras pushConstantRangeCount válidas de VkPushConstantRange

trans-unit.source: If queryPool is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si queryPool es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If queryPool is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, queryPoolmust be a valid VkQueryPool handle
trans-unit.target: Si queryPool no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , queryPool debe ser un identificador VkQueryPool válido

trans-unit.source: If queryType is VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICS, pipelineStatisticsmust be a valid combination of VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: Si queryType es VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICS , pipelineStatistics debe ser una combinación válida de valores de VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits

trans-unit.source: If range is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, range divided by the element size of formatmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxTexelBufferElements
trans-unit.target: Si el range no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el range dividido por el tamaño del elemento del format odebe ser menor o igual que VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxTexelBufferElements

trans-unit.source: If range is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, rangemust be a multiple of the element size of format
trans-unit.target: Si el range no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el range debe ser un múltiplo del tamaño del elemento del format o

trans-unit.source: If range is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, rangemust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: Si el range no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el range debe ser mayor que 0

trans-unit.source: If range is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, rangemust be less than or equal to the size of buffer minus offset
trans-unit.target: Si el range no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el range debe ser menor o igual al tamaño del buffer menos el offset

trans-unit.source: If range is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, the sum of offset and rangemust be less than or equal to the size of buffer
trans-unit.target: Si el range no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , la suma del offset y el range debe ser menor o igual que el tamaño del buffer

trans-unit.source: If renderPass is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si renderPass es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If renderPass is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, renderPassmust be a valid VkRenderPass handle
trans-unit.target: Si renderPass no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , renderPass debe ser un identificador VkRenderPass válido

trans-unit.source: If robustBufferAccess is not enabled, out of bounds accesses may corrupt any memory within the process and cause undefined behavior up to and including application termination.
trans-unit.target: Si robustBufferAccess no está habilitado, los accesos fuera de los límites pueden dañar cualquier memoria dentro del proceso y causar un comportamiento indefinido hasta e incluyendo la terminación de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: If sampler is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si el sampler es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If sampler is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, samplermust be a valid VkSampler handle
trans-unit.target: Si el sampler no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , el sampler debe ser un identificador VkSampler válido

trans-unit.source: If samples is not VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT, imageTypemust be VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D, flagsmust not contain VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT, tilingmust be VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, and mipLevelsmust be equal to 1
trans-unit.target: Si las samples no es VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT , imageType debe ser VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D , las flags no deben contener VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT , el tiling debe ser VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y los mipLevels deben ser iguales a 1

trans-unit.source: If semaphore is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si el semaphore es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, semaphoremust be a valid VkSemaphore handle
trans-unit.target: Si el semaphore no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , el semaphore debe ser un identificador VkSemaphore válido

trans-unit.source: If setLayoutCount is not 0, pSetLayoutsmust be a pointer to an array of setLayoutCount valid VkDescriptorSetLayout handles
trans-unit.target: Si setLayoutCount no es 0 , pSetLayouts debe ser un puntero a una matriz de identificadores VkDescriptorSetLayout válidos de setLayoutCount

trans-unit.source: If shaderModule is a valid handle, it must have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: Si shaderModule es un identificador válido, debe haber sido creado, asignado o recuperado del device

trans-unit.source: If shaderModule is not VK_NULL_HANDLE, shaderModulemust be a valid VkShaderModule handle
trans-unit.target: Si shaderModule no es VK_NULL_HANDLE , shaderModule debe ser un identificador VkShaderModule válido

trans-unit.source: If sharingMode is VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT, pQueueFamilyIndicesmust be a pointer to an array of queueFamilyIndexCountuint32_t values
trans-unit.target: Si sharingMode es VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT , pQueueFamilyIndices debe ser un puntero a una matriz de valores queueFamilyIndexCount uint32_t

trans-unit.source: If sharingMode is VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT, queueFamilyIndexCountmust be greater than 1
trans-unit.target: Si sharingMode es VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT , queueFamilyIndexCount debe ser mayor que 1

trans-unit.source: If sharingMode is VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT, each element of pQueueFamilyIndicesmust be unique and must be less than pQueueFamilyPropertyCount returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties for the physicalDevice that was used to create device
trans-unit.target: Si sharingMode es VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT , cada elemento de pQueueFamilyIndices debe ser único y debe ser menor que pQueueFamilyPropertyCount devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties para el device physicalDevice que se utilizó para crear el dispositivo

trans-unit.source: If signalSemaphoreCount is not 0, pSignalSemaphoresmust be a pointer to an array of signalSemaphoreCount valid VkSemaphore handles
trans-unit.target: Si signalSemaphoreCount no es 0 , pSignalSemaphores debe ser un puntero a un array de signalSemaphoreCount válida VkSemaphore mangos

trans-unit.source: If size is equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, offsetmust be within the currently mapped range of memory
trans-unit.target: Si el size es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el offset debe estar dentro del rango de memory asignado actualmente

trans-unit.source: If size is equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, the end of the current mapping of memorymust be a multiple of VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::nonCoherentAtomSize bytes from the beginning of the memory object.
trans-unit.target: Si el size es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el final del mapeo actual de memory debe ser un múltiplo de VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: nonCoherentAtomSize bytes desde el principio del objeto de memoria.

trans-unit.source: If size is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, offset and sizemust specify a range contained within the currently mapped range of memory
trans-unit.target: Si el size no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el offset y el size deben especificar un rango contenido dentro del rango de memory mapeado actualmente

trans-unit.source: If size is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, sizemust be a multiple of 4
trans-unit.target: Si el size no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el size debe ser múltiplo de 4

trans-unit.source: If size is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, sizemust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: Si el size no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el size debe ser mayor que 0

trans-unit.source: If size is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, sizemust be less than or equal to than the size of buffer minus offset
trans-unit.target: Si el size no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el size debe ser menor o igual que el tamaño del buffer menos el offset

trans-unit.source: If size is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, sizemust be less than or equal to the size of dstBuffer minus dstOffset
trans-unit.target: Si el size no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el size debe ser menor o igual que el tamaño de dstBuffer menos dstOffset

trans-unit.source: If size is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, sizemust be less than or equal to the size of the memory minus offset
trans-unit.target: Si el size no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el size debe ser menor o igual al tamaño de la memory menos el offset

trans-unit.source: If size is not equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, sizemust either be a multiple of VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::nonCoherentAtomSize, or offset plus sizemust equal the size of memory.
trans-unit.target: Si el size no es igual a VK_WHOLE_SIZE , el size debe ser un múltiplo de VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: nonCoherentAtomSize , o el offset más el size debe ser igual al tamaño de la memory .

trans-unit.source: If size is zero, then pfnReallocationmust behave equivalently to a call to PFN_vkFreeFunction with the same pUserData parameter value, and pMemory equal to pOriginal.
trans-unit.target: Si size es cero, entonces pfnReallocation debe comportarse de manera equivalente a una llamada a PFN_vkFreeFunction con el mismo pUserData valor del parámetro, y pMemory igual a pOriginal .

trans-unit.source: If srcBuffer is non-sparse then it must be bound completely and contiguously to a single VkDeviceMemory object
trans-unit.target: Si srcBuffer no es escaso, entonces debe estar vinculado completa y contiguamente a un solo objeto VkDeviceMemory

trans-unit.source: If srcImage is non-sparse then it must be bound completely and contiguously to a single VkDeviceMemory object
trans-unit.target: Si srcImage no es escasa, entonces debe estar vinculada completa y contiguamente a un solo objeto VkDeviceMemory

trans-unit.source: If srcImage was created with a depth/stencil format, filtermust be VK_FILTER_NEAREST
trans-unit.target: Si srcImage se creó con un formato de profundidad / plantilla, el filter debe ser VK_FILTER_NEAREST

trans-unit.source: If srcQueueFamilyIndex is not equal to dstQueueFamilyIndex, and srcQueueFamilyIndex is equal to the current queue family, then the memory barrier defines a queue family release operation for the specified buffer range, and the second access scope includes no access, as if dstAccessMask was 0.
trans-unit.target: Si srcQueueFamilyIndex no es igual a dstQueueFamilyIndex y srcQueueFamilyIndex es igual a la familia de colas actual, la barrera de memoria define una operación de liberación de la familia de colas para el rango de búfer especificado y el segundo ámbito de acceso no incluye acceso, como si dstAccessMask fuera 0 .

trans-unit.source: If srcQueueFamilyIndex is not equal to dstQueueFamilyIndex, and srcQueueFamilyIndex is equal to the current queue family, then the memory barrier defines a queue family release operation for the specified image subresource range, and the second access scope includes no access, as if dstAccessMask was 0.
trans-unit.target: Si srcQueueFamilyIndex no es igual a dstQueueFamilyIndex , y srcQueueFamilyIndex es igual a la familia de colas actual, entonces la barrera de memoria define una operación de liberación de la familia de colas para el rango de subrecursos de imagen especificado, y el segundo alcance de acceso no incluye acceso, como si dstAccessMask fuera 0 .

trans-unit.source: If srcSet is equal to dstSet, then the source and destination ranges of descriptors must not overlap, where the ranges may include array elements from consecutive bindings as described by html/vkspec.html#descriptorsets-updates-consecutive
trans-unit.target: Si srcSet es igual a dstSet , entonces los rangos de origen y destino de los descriptores no deben superponerse, donde los rangos pueden incluir elementos de matriz de enlaces consecutivos como se describe en html / vkspec.html # descriptorsets-updates-secondary

trans-unit.source: If srcSubpass is equal to VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL, the first synchronization scope includes commands submitted to the queue before the render pass instance began. Otherwise, the first set of commands includes all commands submitted as part of the subpass instance identified by srcSubpass and any load, store or multisample resolve operations on attachments used in srcSubpass. In either case, the first synchronization scope is limited to operations on the pipeline stages determined by the source stage mask specified by srcStageMask.
trans-unit.target: Si srcSubpass es igual a VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL , el primer alcance de sincronización incluye comandos enviados a la cola antes de que comenzara la instancia de pase de procesamiento. De lo contrario, el primer conjunto de comandos incluye todos los comandos enviados como parte de la instancia de subpass identificada por srcSubpass y cualquier operación de carga, almacenamiento o resolución de srcSubpass en los adjuntos utilizados en srcSubpass . En cualquier caso, el primer alcance de sincronización se limita a las operaciones en las etapas de la canalización determinadas por la máscara de la etapa de origen especificada por srcStageMask .

trans-unit.source: If srcSubpass is equal to dstSubpass and not all of the stages in srcStageMask and dstStageMask are framebuffer-space stages, the logically latest pipeline stage in srcStageMaskmust be logically earlier than or equal to the logically earliest pipeline stage in dstStageMask
trans-unit.target: Si srcSubpass es igual a dstSubpass y no todas las etapas en srcStageMask y dstStageMask son etapas de framebuffer-space , la última etapa de canalización lógicamente en srcStageMask debe ser lógicamente anterior o igual a la etapa de canalización más temprana lógicamente en dstStageMask

trans-unit.source: If srcSubpass is equal to dstSubpass then the VkSubpassDependency describes a subpass self-dependency, and only constrains the pipeline barriers allowed within a subpass instance. Otherwise, when a render pass instance which includes a subpass dependency is submitted to a queue, it defines a memory dependency between the subpasses identified by srcSubpass and dstSubpass.
trans-unit.target: Si srcSubpass es igual a dstSubpass , entonces VkSubpassDependency describe una autodependencia de subpaso y solo restringe las barreras de tubería permitidas dentro de una instancia de subpaso. De lo contrario, cuando una instancia de pase de procesamiento que incluye una dependencia de subpasos se envía a una cola, define una dependencia de memoria entre los subpasos identificados por srcSubpass y dstSubpass .

trans-unit.source: If srcSubpass is equal to dstSubpass, srcStageMask and dstStageMaskmust only contain one of VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_DRAW_INDIRECT_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_INPUT_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_GEOMETRY_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_FRAGMENT_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_EARLY_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_LATE_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_OUTPUT_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT, or VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si srcSubpass es igual a dstSubpass , srcStageMask y dstStageMask debe contener sólo uno de VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_DRAW_INDIRECT_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_INPUT_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_SHADER_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_GEOMETRY_SHADER_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_FRAGMENT_SHADER_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_EARLY_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_LATE_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_OUTPUT_BIT , VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT o VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS_BIT

trans-unit.source: If srcSubpass is not VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL, srcStageMaskmust not include VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si srcSubpass no es VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL , srcStageMask no debe incluir VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_FRAGMENT_BIT, and the identified entry point writes to FragDepth in any execution path, it must write to FragDepth in all execution paths
trans-unit.target: Si la stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_FRAGMENT_BIT y el punto de entrada identificado escribe en FragDepth en cualquier ruta de ejecución, debe escribir en FragDepth en todas las rutas de ejecución

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_FRAGMENT_BIT, the identified entry point must not include any output variables in its interface decorated with CullDistance
trans-unit.target: Si el stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_FRAGMENT_BIT , el punto de entrada identificado no debe incluir ninguna variable de salida en su interfaz decorada con CullDistance

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT, and the identified entry point writes to Layer for any primitive, it must write the same value to Layer for all vertices of a given primitive
trans-unit.target: Si la stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT , y el punto de entrada identificado escribe en Layer para cualquier primitiva, debe escribir el mismo valor en Layer para todos los vértices de una primitiva dada.

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT, and the identified entry point writes to ViewportIndex for any primitive, it must write the same value to ViewportIndex for all vertices of a given primitive
trans-unit.target: Si la stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT , y el punto de entrada identificado escribe en ViewportIndex para cualquier primitiva, debe escribir el mismo valor en ViewportIndex para todos los vértices de una primitiva dada

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT, the identified entry point must have an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies a maximum output vertex count that is greater than 0 and less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxGeometryOutputVertices
trans-unit.target: Si la stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT , el punto de entrada identificado debe tener una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifique un recuento máximo de vértices de salida que sea mayor que 0 y menor o igual que VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxGeometryOutputVertices

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT, the identified entry point must have an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies an invocation count that is greater than 0 and less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxGeometryShaderInvocations
trans-unit.target: Si la stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT , el punto de entrada identificado debe tener una instrucción OpExecutionMode que especifique un recuento de invocaciones mayor que 0 y menor o igual que VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxGeometryShaderInvocations

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_BIT or VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_BIT, and the identified entry point has an OpExecutionMode instruction that specifies a patch size with OutputVertices, the patch size must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxTessellationPatchSize
trans-unit.target: Si stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_BIT o VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_BIT , y el punto de entrada identificado tiene un OpExecutionMode instrucción que especifica un tamaño del parche con OutputVertices , el tamaño del parche deben ser mayor que 0 y menor que o igual a VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxTessellationPatchSize

trans-unit.source: If stage is VK_SHADER_STAGE_VERTEX_BIT, the identified entry point must not include any input variable in its interface that is decorated with CullDistance
trans-unit.target: Si el stage es VK_SHADER_STAGE_VERTEX_BIT , el punto de entrada identificado no debe incluir ninguna variable de entrada en su interfaz que esté decorada con CullDistance

trans-unit.source: If submitCount is not 0, pSubmitsmust be a pointer to an array of submitCount valid VkSubmitInfo structures
trans-unit.target: Si submitCount no es 0 , pSubmits debe ser un puntero a una matriz de estructuras submitCount válidas de VkSubmitInfo

trans-unit.source: If subpass does not use any color and/or depth/stencil attachments, then the rasterizationSamples member of pMultisampleStatemust follow the rules for a zero-attachment subpass
trans-unit.target: Si subpass no usa ningún color y / o profundidad / archivos adjuntos de plantilla, entonces el miembro rasterizationSamples de pMultisampleState debe seguir las reglas para un subpass sin adjuntos

trans-unit.source: If subpass uses color and/or depth/stencil attachments, then the rasterizationSamples member of pMultisampleStatemust be the same as the sample count for those subpass attachments
trans-unit.target: Si subpass utiliza adjuntos de color y / o profundidad / plantilla, entonces el miembro rasterizationSamples de pMultisampleState debe ser el mismo que el recuento de muestras para esos adjuntos de subpass

trans-unit.source: If subresourceRange::layerCount is not VK_REMAINING_ARRAY_LAYERS, subresourceRange::layerCountmust be non-zero and subresourceRange::baseArrayLayer + subresourceRange::layerCountmust be less than or equal to the arrayLayers specified in VkImageCreateInfo when image was created
trans-unit.target: Si subresourceRange :: layerCount no es VK_REMAINING_ARRAY_LAYERS , subresourceRange :: layerCount debe ser distinto de cero y subresourceRange :: baseArrayLayer + subresourceRange :: layerCount debe ser menor o igual que el arrayLayers especificado en VkImageCreateInfo cuando se creó la image n

trans-unit.source: If subresourceRange::levelCount is not VK_REMAINING_MIP_LEVELS, subresourceRange::levelCountmust be non-zero and subresourceRange::baseMipLevel + subresourceRange::levelCountmust be less than or equal to the mipLevels specified in VkImageCreateInfo when image was created
trans-unit.target: Si subresourceRange :: levelCount no es VK_REMAINING_MIP_LEVELS , subresourceRange :: levelCount debe ser distinto de cero y subresourceRange :: baseMipLevel + subresourceRange :: levelCount debe ser menor o igual a los mipLevels especificados en VkImageCreateInfo cuando se creó la image n

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR, formatmust be a format that has at least one supported feature bit present in the value of VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR , el format odebe ser un formato que tenga al menos un bit de característica admitido presente en el valor de VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR, and VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR y VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures (como lo devuelve vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT ACH , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR, and VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR , y VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures (como lo devuelve vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR, and VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR y VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures (como lo devuelve vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR, and VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR y VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures (como lo devuelve vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, formatmust be a format that has at least one supported feature bit present in the value of VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL , el format odebe ser un formato que tenga al menos un bit de característica admitida presente en el valor de VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, and VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures (según lo devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, and VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures (como lo devuelve vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, and VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL , y VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures (como lo devuelve vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT

trans-unit.source: If tiling is VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, and VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties with the same value of format) does not include VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT, usagemust not contain VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT
trans-unit.target: Si el tiling es VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL y VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures (según lo devuelto por vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties con el mismo valor de format o ) no incluye VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT , el usage no debe contener VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT

trans-unit.source: If timeout is zero, then vkWaitForFences does not wait, but simply returns the current state of the fences. VK_TIMEOUT will be returned in this case if the condition is not satisfied, even though no actual wait was performed.
trans-unit.target: Si el timeout es cero, vkWaitForFences no espera, simplemente devuelve el estado actual de las cercas. VK_TIMEOUT se devolverá en este caso si no se cumple la condición, aunque no se haya realizado una espera real.

trans-unit.source: If topology is VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_POINT_LIST, VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINE_LIST, VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLE_LIST, VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINE_LIST_WITH_ADJACENCY, VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLE_LIST_WITH_ADJACENCY or VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_PATCH_LIST, primitiveRestartEnablemust be VK_FALSE
trans-unit.target: Si topology es VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_POINT_LIST , VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINE_LIST , VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLE_LIST , VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINE_LIST_WITH_ADJACENCY , VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLE_LIST_WITH_ADJACENCY o VK_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_PATCH_LIST , primitiveRestartEnable debe ser VK_FALSE

trans-unit.source: If unnormalizedCoordinates is VK_TRUE, addressModeU and addressModeVmust each be either VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_EDGE or VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_BORDER
trans-unit.target: Si unnormalizedCoordinates es VK_TRUE , addressModeU y addressModeV deben ser VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_EDGE o VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_BORDER

trans-unit.source: If unnormalizedCoordinates is VK_TRUE, anisotropyEnablemust be VK_FALSE
trans-unit.target: Si unnormalizedCoordinates es VK_TRUE , anisotropyEnable debe ser VK_FALSE

trans-unit.source: If unnormalizedCoordinates is VK_TRUE, compareEnablemust be VK_FALSE
trans-unit.target: Si unnormalizedCoordinates es VK_TRUE , compareEnable debe ser VK_FALSE

trans-unit.source: If unnormalizedCoordinates is VK_TRUE, minFilter and magFiltermust be equal
trans-unit.target: Si unnormalizedCoordinates es VK_TRUE , minFilter y magFilter deben ser iguales

trans-unit.source: If unnormalizedCoordinates is VK_TRUE, minLod and maxLodmust be zero
